name: Herbs
tagline: Monitors and controls an indoor herb garden
body:
### Welcome
This page describes a small project that allows me to monitor herbs that I grow indoors.  I am basically interested in the moisture level for each herb.  Additionally I can monitor temperature and humidity.  The collected information is then uploaded into separate feeds on [io.adafruit.com](https://io.adafruit.com).  Feeds are monitored by [IFTTT](https://ifttt.com/) application and when the moisture level falls below specified value, a notification is send to a smart phone, i.e. time to water the herbs.
